title: How does science conquer disease and death? - Quora

response.answer_text: By not taking for granted optimal health and the miracle of birth. Especially from the scientific viewpoint of “one’s own”. Mental and physical health. Without an appreciation of both, trivialize to your heart’s content anyone, anything, any place, any idea, and any time — past, present, and future. With an appreciation of both, understand space-time and the 5.256 billion heartbeats gifted or allotted (for a 100 bpm, 100 year old). Dr. Carl Sagan is and was in this category though he passed well short of “his” 100 years.
